verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:15
verses.text: And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:16
verses.text: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:17
verses.text: And the porters were, Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:18
verses.text: Who hitherto waited in the king’s gate eastward: they were porters in the companies of the children of Levi.
